schema.prompt:
Generate compelling advertising copy based on:

Campaign Theme: {{input.campaignTheme}}
Slogans: {{input.slogans}}
Key Features: {{input.keyFeatures}}
Benefits: {{input.benefits}}
Brand Voice: {{input.brandVoice}}
Ad Platforms: {{input.adPlatforms}}

Create comprehensive ad copy variations:

1. Short Ad Copy (Under 50 words):
   - Headlines (5-10 words)
   - Sub-headlines
   - Google Ads format
   - Social media ads
   - Banner ad text

2. Medium Ad Copy (50-150 words):
   - Facebook/Instagram ads
   - LinkedIn sponsored content
   - Display ad copy
   - Video ad scripts
   - Radio spots (30 sec)

3. Long Ad Copy (150+ words):
   - Landing page hero text
   - Email body copy
   - Blog ad content
   - Native advertising
   - Advertorial copy

4. Call-to-Action Variations:
   - Urgency-based CTAs
   - Benefit-focused CTAs
   - Curiosity CTAs
   - Social proof CTAs
   - Personalized CTAs

5. Platform-Specific Copy:
   - Google Search Ads (headlines + descriptions)
   - Facebook/Instagram (primary text + headline)
   - LinkedIn (intro text + headline)
   - Twitter/X (character-limited)
   - YouTube (video description)

6. A/B Test Variations:
   - Different angles
   - Emotional vs rational
   - Feature vs benefit focus
   - Question vs statement
   - Short vs detailed

7. Compliance Elements:
   - Disclaimers if needed
   - Terms and conditions
   - Promotional details
   - Legal requirements

8. Performance Copy:
   - High-converting phrases
   - Power words usage
   - Psychological triggers
   - FOMO elements
   - Trust signals

Return as structured JSON with keys: shortAdCopy (array), mediumAdCopy (array), longAdCopy (array), callToActions (array categorized), platformSpecific (object by platform), abTestVariations (array), complianceElements (array), performanceCopy (object).
